chapter.text: 26|1|To, sin, mim
26|2|In ojoti kitoʙi ravsangar ast
26|3|Sojad mexohi az [anduhi] in ki [musrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kuni
26|4|Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nisonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaras ʙo furutani sar furud ovarand
26|5|Va hec pandi tozae az sui [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on ruj gardonand
26|6|Ba rosti, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] duruƣ angostand, pas, ʙa zudi axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eson xohad rasid
26|7|Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rujonidaem
26|8|Be tardid, dar in [ofarinis] nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙestarason imon nameovarand
26|9|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|10|Va [jod kun az] hangome ki Parvardigorat Musoro nido dod, ki: «Ba suji qavmi sitamgor ʙirav
26|11|– qavmi Fir'avn - [va ʙa onon ʙigu] ojo [az kufru sarkasi] nameparhezand?»
26|12|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙim doram, ki maro duruƣgu angorand
26|13|Va [az kufrason nosikeʙo va] ƣamgin gardam. Pas, [Caʙrailro] ʙa suji Horun ʙifrist [to ʙaroi joriam rahsiporas kunad]
26|14|Va onon [ʙa gumoni xes qasosi] gunohe ʙar man dorand, pas, metarsam, ki maro ʙikusand»
26|15|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Hargiz! Pas ʙo ojot [va mu'cizot]-i Mo ʙiraved. Jaqinan, [hama co] ʙo sumoem va [guftugujatonro] mesunavem
26|16|Pas, nazdi Fir'avn ʙiraved va ʙigued: «Mo firistodai Parvardigori cahonijon hastem
26|17|[U mefarmojad] Ki Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist»
26|18|[Fir'avn] guft: «Ojo turo dar kudaki mijoni xes parvaris nadodem va solhoe az umratro ʙajni mo naʙudi
26|19|Va kori xudro – cunon ki xosti – kardi [va on mardi qiʙtiro kusti] va tu [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi man] nosiposi?!»
26|20|[Muso] guft: «Man on [kor]-ro zamone ancom dodam, ki gumroh ʙudam
26|21|Pas, cun az sumo tarsidam, firor kardam. On goh Parvardigoram ʙa man donis ʙaxsid va maro az pajomʙaron qaror dod
26|22|Va in [ci] ne'matest, ki tu ʙar man minnat meguzori, ki Bani Isroilro ʙardai xud soxtai?!»
26|23|Fir'avn guft: «Parvardigori cahonijon kist?»
26|24|[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. Agar ahli jaqin hasted [tanho uro ʙiparasted]»
26|25|[Fir'avn] Ba kasone, ki dar atrofas ʙudand [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Ojo mesunaved [ci megujad]?»
26|26|[Muso] Guft: «[Alloh taolo] Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori nijogoni sumost
26|27|[Fir'avn] Guft: «In pajomʙaraton, ki ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaast, jaqinan devona ast»
26|28|[Muso] Guft: «Agar ʙiandesed, [xohed donist, ki U] Parvardigori masriq va maƣriʙ ast va har on ci mijoni on du qaror dorad»
26|29|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar ma'ʙude cuz man ʙarguzini, hatman, zindonat mekunam»
26|30|[Muso] Guft: «Hatto agar nisonai oskore [dar mavridi risolatam] ʙarojat ovarda ʙosam?»
26|31|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar rost megui, onro ʙijovar»
26|32|Pas, [Muso] asoi xudro andoxt, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa] aƶdahoe oskor sud
26|33|Va dastasro [az gireʙon] ʙerun ovard va nogoh dar nazari ʙinandagon saped [-u ravsan] ʙud
26|34|[Fir'avn] ʙa ʙuzurgoni peromunas guft: «Haqqo, ki in [mard] codugari donost
26|35|[U] Mexohad, ʙo codujas sumoro az sarzaminaton ʙerun kunad, pas, nazaraton cist?»
26|36|Onon guftand: «[Tasmim dar ʙorai mucozoti] u va ʙarodarasro ʙa ta'xir andoz va ma'muroni cam'ovari [corzanandagon]-ro ʙa [hamai] sahrho ʙifirist
26|37|to har codugari mohir [va] donoero nazdat ʙijovarand»
26|38|Pas, [cunin kardand va sarancom] codugaron ʙaroi va'dagohi ruzi muajjan gird ovarda sudand
26|39|Va ʙa mardum gufta sud: «Ojo sumo [niz] cam' mesaved, to [ʙuʙinem ʙaranda kist]
26|40|Agar codugaron piruz sudand, [hamagi] az onon pajravi kunem»
26|41|Pas, vaqte codugaron omadand, ʙa Fir'avn guftand: «Agar mo piruz savem, ojo podose xohem dost»
26|42|U guft: «Ore, dar on surat, hatman, az nazdikonam xohed ʙud»
26|43|Muso ʙa onon guft: «Har ci [mexohed] ʙiafkaned, [aknun] ʙiafkaned»
26|44|Pas, onon resmonho va asohojasonro afkandand va guftand: «Ba izzati Fir'avn savgand, ki mo, hatman, piruzem»
26|45|Sipas Muso asojasro afkand, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa aƶdahoe sud va] on ciro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, ʙal'id [furu ʙurd]
26|46|Pas, codugaron ʙa sacda daraftodand
26|47|[Va] Guftand: «Mo ʙa Parvardigori cahonijon imon ovardem
26|48|Parvardigori Muso va Horun»

26|49|[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham, ʙa u imon ovarded? Be tardid, u hamon ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codu omuxtaast. Pas, ʙa zudi xohed donist [ki mucozotaton cist]. Jaqinan, dastho va pojhojatonro ʙar'aks [-i jakdigar az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro ʙa dor meovezam»
26|50|Onon guftand: «[Dar in sikanca va azoʙ] Hec zijone nest. Be tardid, mo ʙa suji Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem
26|51|Umed dorem, ki Parvardigoramon gunohoni moro ʙuʙaxsad, ki mo naxustin kasone hastem, ki [az in qavm ʙa Parvardigori Muso] imon ovardem»
26|52|Va ʙa Muso vahj kardem, ki: «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar; [zero sipohi Fir'avn] hatman, ʙa dunʙolaton xohad omad»
26|53|Pas Fir'avn [cun az mocaro ogoh gardid] ma'muroni cam'ovari [neru]-ro ʙa sahrho firistod
26|54|[Va e'lon kard] Inho [Bani Isroil] iddai nocizand
26|55|Va ciddan moro ʙa xasm ovardaand
26|56|Va mo hamagi komilan [husjoru] omodai pajkorem»
26|57|Pas, ononro az ʙoƣho va casmaho [-i sarzamini Misr] ʙerun ovardem
26|58|Va az gancho va xonahoi mucallal [dur soxtem]
26|59|Incunin [kardem] va Bani Isroilro vorisi on [sarvatu doroi] kardem
26|60|Pas, [sipohi Fir'avn] hangomi tului oftoʙ ʙa ta'qiʙi onon pardoxtand
26|61|Va cun du guruh jakdigarro didand, joroni Muso guftand: «Hatman, [dar cangoli fir'avnijon] giriftorem»
26|62|[Muso] Guft: «Hargiz! Be tardid, Parvardigoram ʙo man ast va maro [ʙa rohi nacot] hidojat xohad kard»
26|63|Pas, ʙa Muso vahj kardem: «Asojatro ʙa darjo ʙizan», pas, [Nil] sikofta sud va har ʙaxse [az on] hamcun kuhe ʙuzurg gast
26|64|Va on guruhi digar [sipohi Fir'avn]-ro ʙa on co kasondem
26|65|Va Muso va hamai kasonero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, nacot dodem
26|66|Va digaronro ƣarq namudem
26|67|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|68|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|69|[Ej pajomʙar] Dostoni Iʙrohimro ʙar onon ʙozgu
26|70|Hangome ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: «Ci cizro meparasted?»
26|71|Onon guftand: «Buthoero meparastem va pajvasta sar ʙar ostonason dorem»
26|72|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ojo vaqte onhoro mexoned, [sadoi] sumoro mesunavand
26|73|Jo ʙa sumo sudu zijon merasonand?»
26|74|Onon guftand: «[Na] Vale padaronamonro joftem, ki cunin mekardand»
26|75|[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo dided [va donisted] cizhoero, ki hamvora meparastided
26|76|[ham] sumo va [ham] padaronaton –
26|77|jaqinan, [hamai] onho dusmani [aqidai tavhidii] man hastand. Magar Parvardigori cahonijon
26|78|On [ma'ʙude], ki maro ofarida va hidojatam mekunad
26|79|Va hamone, ki ʙa man ƣizo medihad va seroʙam mesozad
26|80|Va hangome ki ʙemor mesavam, Ust, ki sifojam medihad
26|81|Va kase, ki maro memironad va [duʙora] zindaam mekunad
26|82|Va kase, ki umed doram ruzi cazo gunohonamro ʙuʙaxsad
26|83|Parvardigoro, ʙa man donise [dar din] ʙuʙaxs va maro ʙa soistagon mulhaq kun
26|84|Va ʙarojam dar ojandagon ovozai nek qaror ʙideh
26|85|Va maro az vorisoni ʙihisti purne'mat ʙigardon
26|86|Va padaramro ʙijomurz, [ki] ʙe tardid, dar zumrai gumrohon ʙud
26|87|Va ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, maro rasvo [va sarmanda] nasoz
26|88|Hamon ruze, ki molu farzandon sude nameʙaxsand
26|89|Magar kase, ki ʙo qalʙi pok [va xoli az sirku nifoq va rijo] ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ʙijojad»
26|90|Va [on ruz] ʙihist ʙaroi parhezkoron nazdik megardad
26|91|Va duzax ʙaroi gumrohon oskor mesavad
26|92|Va ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «On ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastided, [aknun] kuco hastand
26|93|Ojo [onho dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi ilohi] joriaton mekunand jo [hatto xud]-ro jori medihand?»
26|94|Pas, onho [ʙutho] hamrohi gumrohon dar on [otasi havlangez] afkanda mesavand
26|95|Va [hamrohi] tamomi laskarijoni Iʙlis
26|96|Dar on co [musrikon] dar holi sitez [ʙo ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] megujand
26|97|«Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki mo dar gumrohii oskore ʙudem»
26|98|On goh ki sumoro ʙo Parvardigori cahonijon ʙaroʙar medonistem
26|99|Va moro kase cuz mucrimon gumroh nakard
26|100|Pas, [aknun] na hec safoatgare dorem
26|101|Va na hec dusti mehruʙone
26|102|Pas, kos ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] dostem va dar zumrai mu'minon qaror megiriftem»
26|103|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|104|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|105|Qavmi Nuh pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|106|On goh ki ʙarodarason Nuh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
26|107|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|108|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|109|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|110|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|111|Onon guftand: «Ojo ʙa tu imon ʙijovarem, dar hole ki [faqat] furumojagon] az tu pajravi kardaand?»
26|112|[Nuh] Guft: «Man ʙa on ci onon [dar guzasta] mekardand, ci donise doram
26|113|Hisoʙi onon tanho ʙo Parvardigori man ast. Agar mefahmed [cunin suxani gazofe nagued]
26|114|Va man [hargiz] mu'minonro tard [dur] namekunam
26|115|Man cuz ʙimdihandai oskor nestam»
26|116|Onon guftand: «Ej Nuh, agar [az da'vatat] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, sangsor mesavi»
26|117|U guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmam maro duruƣgu angostand
26|118|Pas, mijoni manu eson dovari kun va maro va mu'minonero, ki hamroham hastand, nacot ʙideh»
26|119|Pas, u va afrodero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, dar [on] kistii oganda [ pur az insonu hajvon] nacot dodem
26|120|Va ʙoqimondagonro ƣarq kardem
26|121|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|122|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|123|[Qavmi] Od pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|124|On goh ki ʙarodarason Hud ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?”
26|125|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|126|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|127|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|128|Ojo ʙar har makoni ʙalande ʙinoe ʙehuda mesozed
26|129|Va qasrho va qal'ahoi muhkamu ustuvor ʙino mekuned, guijo [dar dunjo] covidonaed
26|130|Va cun [ʙa kase] hamlavar mesaved, [ʙerahm va] zolimona hamla mekuned
26|131|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|132|Va az kase parvo kuned, ki ʙa sumo [ne'mathoe cunon farovon] ato kardaast, ki xud [onhoro ʙehtar] medoned
26|133|U ʙa sumo cahorpojonu farzandon [-i ʙisjor] ato kardaast
26|134|Va ʙoƣho va casmasorho
26|135|Ba rosti, ki man az azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg ʙar sumo metarsam”
26|136|Onon guftand: “Ci moro pand ʙidihi, jo nadihi, ʙarojamon jakson ast [va az tu toat namekunem]
26|137|In [oini mo hamon] ravisi pesinijon ast
26|138|va mo [hargiz] azoʙ naxohem sud»
26|139|Pas, onon Hudro duruƣgu angostand. Pas, Mo [niz] halokason kardem. Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|140|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|141|[Qavmi] Samud pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|142|On goh ki ʙarodarason Soleh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|143|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|144|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|145|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|146|Ojo [mepindored, ki] sumoro dar ne'mathoe, ki in cost, osuda raho mekunand
26|147|Dar [in] ʙoƣho va casmasorho
26|148|Va [dar kanori in] kistzorho va naxlhoe, ki mevahojas narmu rasidaast
26|149|Va mohirona az kuhho [ʙaroi xud] xonahoe metarosed
26|150|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|151|Va az isrofkoron [-i gunahgor] pajravi nakuned
26|152|[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar zamin ʙa fasod mepardozand va [xestanro] isloh namekunand”
26|153|Onon guftand: “[Ej Soleh] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|154|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti, pas, agar rost megui, nisonae [ʙar pajomʙariat] ʙijovar”
26|155|[Soleh] Guft: «In modasuturest, ki sahme az oʙ [-i casma] dorad va [ruzhoi muajjane niz] sumo sahme az oʙ dored
26|156|Pas, [kamtarin] ozore ʙa on narasoned, ki azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg sumoro faro megirad”
26|157|Pas, onro [zaxmi kardand va] kustand va [on goh az kardai xud] pusajmon sudand
26|158|Pas, azoʙ [-i ilohi] ononro furu girift. Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|159|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|160|Qavmi Lut [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|161|On goh ki ʙarodarason Lut ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|162|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
26|163|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|164|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|165|Az mardumi cahon ʙo mardon meomezed
26|166|va hamsaronero, ki Alloh taolo ʙarojaton ofaridaast, raho mekuned? Balki sumo guruhi mutacovized
26|167|Onon guftand: «Ej Lut, agar [az in amru nahj] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, [az sahr] ixroc mesavi»
26|168|[Lut] Guft: «Man dusmani [sarsaxti] in koraton hastam
26|169|Parvardigoro, man va xonavodaamro az [oqiʙati] on ci [inho] ancom medihand, nacot deh»
26|170|Pas, mo u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
26|171|Magar pirazane, ki dar mijoni ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
26|172|Sipas digaronro noʙud kardem
26|173|Va ʙar onon ʙorone [az sang] ʙoronidem va ʙoroni ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙad ʙud
26|174|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|175|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|176|Ashoʙi Ajka [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|177|On goh ki Suajʙ ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|178|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
26|179|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed] va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|180|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|181|Pajmonaro tamom ʙidihed va kamfurusi nakuned
26|182|Va ʙo tarozui durust vazn kuned
26|183|Va koloi mardumro kam nadihed [va haqqasonro zoe' nakuned] va dar zamin ʙa fasod [va taʙohi] nakused
26|184|Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
26|185|Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|186|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
26|187|Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
26|188|[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
26|189|Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
26|190|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|191|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|192|Va ʙa rosti, [in] Qur'on furufiristodai Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|193|Ruhu-l-amin [Caʙrail] onro furud ovardaast
26|194|Bar qalʙi tu [nozil kardaast], to ʙimdihanda ʙosi
26|195|[Qur'onro] Ba zaʙoni araʙii ravsan [nozil namud]
26|196|Va ʙe tardid, [ʙasorati nuzuli] on dar kitoʙhoi pesinijon [niz omada] ast
26|197|Ojo hamin nisona ʙarojason kofi nest, ki ulamoi Bani Isroil az [haqiqati] Qur'on ogohand
26|198|Va agar onro ʙar ʙa'ze az ƣajriaraʙho nozil mekardem
26|199|Va [pajomʙar] onro ʙarojason mexond, ʙa on imon nameovardand
26|200|[Ore] In guna on [kufru takziʙ]-ro dar dilhoi gunahgoron coj dodem
26|201|Ammo ʙa on imon nameovarand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardnokro ʙuʙinand
26|202|Pas, nogahon dar hole ki ʙexaʙarand, ʙa suroƣason meojad
26|203|Pas, [dar on hol] megujand: “Ojo muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] xohem dost?”
26|204|Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
26|205|Ojo donisti, ki agar ononro solho [az zindagii dunjo] ʙahramand sozem
26|206|Sipas on ci ki ʙa onon va'da doda sudaast, ʙa suroƣasonn ʙijojad
26|207|In ʙahramandiason [az dunjo dar hangomi azoʙ] sude ʙarojason naxohad dost
26|208|Va Mo [sokinoni] hec sahrero halok nakardem, magar in ki husdordihandagone [az pajomʙaron] dostand
26|209|To ononro pand dihand va Mo hargiz sitamgor naʙudaem [ki itmomi huccat nakunem]
26|210|Va in Qur'onro sajotin nozil nakardaand
26|211|Onon na darxuri in korand va na tavonasro dorand
26|212|Be tardid, onon az sunidani [vahj] ʙarkanorand
26|213|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] hec ma'ʙudero ʙo Alloh taolo maxon, ki azoʙ xohi sud
26|214|Va xesovandoni nazdikatro [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙim deh
26|215|Va ʙo mu'minone, ki az tu pajravi kardaand, mehruʙon [-u furutan] ʙos
26|216|Pas, agar az [farmoni] tu sarpeci kardand, ʙigu: “Ba rosti, man az on ci mekuned, ʙezoram”
26|217|Va ʙar [Allohi] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon tavakkal kun
26|218|Hamon ki cun [ʙaroi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, turo meʙinad
26|219|Va harakat [va nisastu ʙarxosti] turo mijoni sacdakunandagon [meʙinad]
26|220|Be tardid, U hamon sunavoi donost
26|221|Ojo ʙa sumo xaʙar diham, ki sajotin ʙar ci kase nozil mesavand
26|222|Bar har duruƣgui gunahkor
26|223|Onon sunidahoe [-ro, ki duzdona az malakut gus dodaand, ʙa codugaron va folgiron] ilqo mekunand va ʙestarason duruƣgu hastand
26|224|Va [Muhammad soir nest, zero] soironro gumrohon pajravi mekunand
26|225|Ojo nadidi, ki onon dar har laƣvu ʙehudae [hajronu] sargastaand
26|226|Va cizero megujand, ki [xud ʙa on e'tiqod nadorand va] amal namekunand

26|227|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand va Allohro ʙisjor jod kardaand va pas az on ki sitam didand, intiqom giriftand [va ʙo se'ri xud az islomu muslimin difo' namudand] va kasone, ki sitam kardand, ʙa zudi xohand donist, ʙa ci ʙozgastgohe ʙozmegardand
